getAvailableMove

public Move getAvailableMove(Position position,
                             boolean affinity)
                      throws NoSuchElementException
Note that this may return a false positive as the game may be in check.

Parameters:
position - the wanted position
affinity - the affinity of the player that should be able to move into the position
Returns:
the first available move for the given position and the given affinity
Throws:
NoSuchElementException - if no move is available

moveThreateningPosition

public Move moveThreateningPosition(Position position,
                                    boolean affinity,
                                    Piece pieceThatWonders)
This method checks for a move that could reach the given position by the other player in one move

Parameters:
position - the position to check
affinity - the affinity of the threatening player
Returns:
a move if the player with the given affinity could move into position in one move, otherwise null
